#summary this page informs about installing Smallapack on Cincom Visualworks.

= Introduction =

Installing Smallapack on Cincom Visualworks should be straight forward, since Store performs much of the work.


= Details =

The first thing is to have an access configured on [http://www.cincomsmalltalk.com/publicRepository Cincom public store]

It is then necessary to open the store repository, select and load the Smallapack bundle.

The last steps are:
  * get a BLAS/LAPACK dynamic link library [SmallapackPrerequisiste]
  * open the settings and configure the BLAS/LAPACK library names and path
